blogPost.excerpt: ProdEasy is a product management platform that smart teams use to put the customer at the center of all their product management activities.
blogPost.body: ProdEasy is a product management platform that smart teams use to put the customer at the center of all their product management activities.
blogPost.title: Prodeasy - Product Management platform for the teams of all sizes
blogPost.author: Kinshuk Kale

localize.description: ProdEasy是一个产品管理平台，聪明的团队使用它来将客户置于所有产品管理活动的中心。
localize.tagline: 为各种规模的团队提供产品管理平台

localize.description: ProdEasy是一個產品管理平臺，聰明的團隊使用它來將客戶置於所有產品管理活動的中心。
localize.tagline: 爲各種規模的團隊提供產品管理平臺

previous.excerpt: Create engaging conversational surveys with Curious Karen. Enjoy unlimited surveys, question and responses. Now, available in Dark mode! 🖤
previous.title: Curious Karen Dark Mode - A combination of small talk, conditional logic & chatbot

localize.description: 使用Curious Karen创建引人入胜的对话式调查。享受无限制的调查、问题和回复。现在，可在黑暗模式下使用 🖤
localize.tagline: 闲聊、条件逻辑与聊天机器人的结合。

localize.description: 使用Curious Karen創建引人入勝的對話式調查。享受無限制的調查、問題和回覆。現在，可在黑暗模式下使用 🖤
localize.tagline: 閒聊、條件邏輯與聊天機器人的結合。

next.excerpt: Zeta Joint Cards are designed for the modern couple. Couples get a joint account and two debit cards, allowing both partners to keep tabs on their shared finances including paying bills and saving together. Our goal is to make shared banking delightful.
next.title: Zeta Joint Cards - Shared banking for modern couples

localize.description: Zeta联名卡是为现代夫妇设计的。夫妻双方可获得一个联名账户和两张借记卡，让双方都能掌握共同的财务状况，包括共同支付账单和储蓄。我们的目标是让共同的银行业务变得更愉快。
localize.tagline: 现代夫妇的共同银行业务

localize.description: Zeta聯名卡是爲現代夫婦設計的。夫妻雙方可獲得一個聯名賬戶和兩張借記卡，讓雙方都能掌握共同的財務狀況，包括共同支付賬單和儲蓄。我們的目標是讓共同的銀行業務變得更愉快。
localize.tagline: 現代夫婦的共同銀行業務
